title: Saveetha Engineering College - Executive Summary
key_highlights: Established in 1987, part of SIMATS deemed university
90%+ placement rate with top MNC recruiters
Comprehensive startup ecosystem with STBI, EDC, and Innovation Foundation
Strong industry partnerships with IBM, Microsoft, Intel, Cisco
startup_ecosystem_highlights: Saveetha Technology Business Incubator (STBI) - 50+ startups incubated
₹10+ Crores funding raised by incubated startups
industry_integration: Top recruiters: TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Amazon, Microsoft
Strong partnerships with leading technology companies
